name: Wired Saintz
description:
Team Red Chair - Wired Saintz

Story (Brief)
In an alternate reality, where religious robots are being attacked by humans, Rusty, an engineer is the last line of defense between the wrath of mankind and the last Robotic Cathedral of the Goat in a dispute for the mecha-holy ground that has unlimited oil fountains.
The game happens during what would be around 1915`s

==CONTROLS - KEYBOARD==
A/D - Move Left/Right
W/S - Climb Up/Down
SHIFT (hold) - RUN
Q (hold) - REPAIR
E - UPGRADE
S - COLLECT ITEM
ESCAPE - PAUSE GAME

==XBOX CONTROLLER==
LEFT STICK - Move Left/Right
LEFT- Climb Up/Down
A (hold) - RUN
Y (hold) - REPAIR
B - UPGRADE
X - COLLECT ITEM
START - PAUSE GAME
